scripts.start: npm run build:happ && npm run start:agent
scripts.network: npm run build:happ && concurrently-repeat "npm run start:agent"
scripts.start:agent: cross-env HC_PORT=$(port) concurrently "npm run dev:libs" "npm run start:happ" "sleep 5 && npm run start -w syntext"
scripts.dev:libs: concurrently "npm run build:watch -w @syn/zome-client" "npm run build:watch -w @syn/store" "npm run build:watch -w @syn/elements"
scripts.test: npm run build:happ && npm run build -w @syn/zome-client -w @syn/store && npm test -w @syn/tests
scripts.start:happ: hc s generate -r=$HC_PORT dna/workdir/happ/syn.happ -a syn network --bootstrap https://bootstrap-staging.holo.host/ quic
scripts.build:happ: npm run build:dna && hc app pack dna/workdir/happ
scripts.build:dna: npm run build:zome && hc dna pack dna/workdir/dna
scripts.build:zome: cd dna && CARGO_TARGET_DIR=target cargo build --release --target wasm32-unknown-unknown
